spiritsExplanation:
The workout video is strongly aligned with the "Soothing & Restorative" spirit, as indicated by the title '10 minute Stretching Routine' and the emphasis on releasing tight back muscles and back pain relief in the description. Thus, it earns a score of 0.9 for this spirit, indicating a very strong match.

Other spirits such as "High-Energy & Intense" or "Sport & Agility" are excluded due to the video's focus on relaxation and flexibility rather than aggressive physical exertion or sports-specific skills.
